item.title: RT Lance Martin: Great to see @nomic_ai new long context (8k token), oss, embeddings! Just used them to build a long context RAG app from scratch (in ...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇLance Martin
Great to see @nomic_ai new long context (8k token), oss, embeddings!

Just used them to build a long context RAG app from scratch (in ~10 min) w/:
+ @nomic_ai embeddings
+ @trychroma
+ @MistralAI-instruct 32k (locally via @ollama)
+ LangServe

Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2nLDe_igVnE
item.author: LangChain

item.title: Build Long-context RAG from scratch: Nomic Embeddings + Mistral The context window of open source LLMs and embedding models has been relatively small ...
item.description:
Build Long-context RAG from scratch: Nomic Embeddings + Mistral

The context window of open source LLMs and embedding models has been relatively small vs proprietary models. But, methods to expand context window (RoPE, self-extend) are quickly changing this.

Today, @nomic_ai has‚Ä¶

item.title: RT Ankush Gola: LangSmith now makes it very easy to understand how test runs are performing over time
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇAnkush Gola
LangSmith now makes it very easy to understand how test runs are performing over time


LangChain:‚ÄÇüìàTrack Eval Performance Across Revisions in LangSmithüìà

Want to make sure that performance on a benchmark dataset isn't degrading as you try new models, tweak the prompt, or change your retrieval strategy?

This is now very easy to do with the introduction of test run charts in‚Ä¶

item.title: Re @nomic_ai Embeddings ‚ÜóÔ∏è Today we're thrilled to unveil the new langchain-nomic Python package, which integrtes with Nomic's Embedding API. Experi...
item.description:
Re @nomic_ai Embeddings ‚ÜóÔ∏è

Today we're thrilled to unveil the new langchain-nomic Python package, which integrtes with Nomic's Embedding API.

Experience the power of embedding models that deliver results competitive with OpenAI's new text-embedding-3 models.


Nomic AI:‚ÄÇIntroducing Nomic Embed - the first fully open long context text embedder to beat OpenAI

- Open source, open weights, open data
- Beats OpenAI text-embeding-3-small and Ada on short and long context benchmarks
- Day 1 integrations with @langchain, @llama-index, @MongoDB
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Harrison Chase: Huge milestone We‚Äôve been investing a lot more in the JS/TS ecosystem. Feature parity with langchain-core and Langgraph If you‚Äôre...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇHarrison Chase
Huge milestone

We‚Äôve been investing a lot more in the JS/TS ecosystem. Feature parity with langchain-core and Langgraph

If you‚Äôre interested in working with @Hacubu and the team on this, reach out to me/him - we‚Äôre hiring!


Jacob Lee:‚ÄÇüéâüìà @LangChainAI JS/TS hit 1M downloads in January!

Incredible to see enterprises + hackers alike in the #JavaScript community leverage their unique skillsets to ship with LangChain - including many new to AI.

Thank you to all our contributors who make this possible üöÄüöÄ!

item.title: RT cohere: Tomorrow marks the beginning of the Cohere x @NYSE hackathon. Thanks to the NYSE for collaborating with us and with our AI partners at @wea...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇcohere
Tomorrow marks the beginning of the Cohere x @NYSE hackathon. Thanks to the NYSE for collaborating with us and with our AI partners at @weaviate_io, @LangChainAI, and @lablabai for their contributions to the event. We can't wait to see the innovative projects that will come out!

item.title: RT Sopandev Tewari: Extract posts on interested topics from your X feed üòé ‚úçÔ∏è Specify topics of interest üïë Run the automation üìî Get post sum...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇSopandev Tewari
Extract posts on interested topics from your X feed üòé

‚úçÔ∏è Specify topics of interest
üïë Run the automation
üìî Get post summary and URLs

Built in just a few hours using LangGraph ü¶úüï∏Ô∏è by @LangChainAI! üëè

Really excited to explore and build many more tools using LangGraph üèóÔ∏è


LangChain:‚ÄÇü¶úüï∏Ô∏èLangGraph

We introduced LangGraph last week, but are excited to launch it more officially today (blog and YouTube series). It includes:

ü§ñExample of replicating the LangChain AgentExecutor
üí¨A chat agent executor (aimed specifically at chat models)

LangGraph makes it easy‚Ä¶

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: Excited to get more devs building with the @CloudflareDev ‚õÖÔ∏è + @LangChainAI JS/TS ü¶úüîó! There's even a full example RAG app that s...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
Excited to get more devs building with the @CloudflareDev ‚õÖÔ∏è + @LangChainAI JS/TS ü¶úüîó!

There's even a full example RAG app that serves a @nuxt_js + @vuejs app entirely from a Cloudflare Worker.

Ingest into Vectorize included! See the blog for more:

https://blog.cloudflare.com/langchain-support-for-workers-ai-vectorize-and-d1/


Ricky:‚ÄÇIf you're building AI applications with @LangChainAI (and you should be!), it's now even easier to integrate with @CloudflareDev Workers AI, Vectorize and D1! üéâüéâüéâ

(Thanks to @Hacubu and the @LangChainAI team for being so rad!)

https://blog.cloudflare.com/langchain-support-for-workers-ai-vectorize-and-d1/
item.author: LangChain
